Title: Relates to directing the board of elections to canvass certain absentee ballots for elections held June 23, 2020
Summary: Directs the board of elections to canvass certain absentee ballots for elections held June 23, 2020, establishes a presumption that any absentee ballot received between June 23, 2020 and June 30, 2020 that does not bear or display a dated postmark was timely mailed and delivered.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the board of elections to canvass certain absentee ballots for elections held June 23, 2020
